question.body: Which of the following is not correct about decussation?

multiple_choice.choice: It can occur in the spinal cord.
It can occur in the brains stem.

response.feedback: Incorrect. This is correct as the location of some spinal tract crossing over.
Incorrect. This is correct as the location of some spinal tract crossing over.
Correct. If decussation occurs it would be a contralateral relationship.
Incorrect. This is correct when one side of body sends sensory input to other side of brain.
Incorrect. This is correct when one side of brain controls opposite side of body.
